trans-unit.source: Loads an assembly, and runs all the installers in it.
trans-unit.target: 加载一个程序集，并在其中运行的所有安装程序。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller"></xref> class, and specifies both the assembly to install and the command line to use when creating a new <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller"></xref>类，并指定要安装的程序集和命令行创建一个新时要使用<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> to install.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>安装。</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: The command line to use when creating a new <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref> object for the assembly's installation.
trans-unit.target: 命令行创建一个新时要使用<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref>程序集的安装的对象。

trans-unit.source: Can be a null value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 null 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller"></xref> class, and specifies both the file name of the assembly to install and the command line to use when creating a new <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref> object for the assembly's installation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller"></xref>类，并指定要安装的程序集和命令行创建一个新时要使用的文件名称<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref>程序集的安装的对象。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the assembly to install.
trans-unit.target: 要安装的程序集文件名。

trans-unit.source: The command line to use when creating a new <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref> object for the assembly's installation.
trans-unit.target: 命令行创建一个新时要使用<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref>程序集的安装的对象。

trans-unit.source: Can be a null value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 null 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the assembly to install.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要安装的程序集。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> that defines the assembly to install.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>，它定义要安装的程序集。</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: The property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 该属性值将<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Checks to see if the specified assembly can be installed.
trans-unit.target: 检查以确定是否可以安装指定的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The CheckIfInstallable method determines whether the specified assembly can be installed.
trans-unit.target: CheckIfInstallable 方法确定是否可以安装指定的程序集。

trans-unit.source: To avoid an exception being thrown, the file must meet the following criteria: - The file exists.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免引发异常，该文件必须满足以下条件:-该文件存在。

trans-unit.source: - The file is a .NET Framework assembly.
trans-unit.target: -该文件是.NET Framework 程序集。

trans-unit.source: - The public types can be read from the file.
trans-unit.target: 的可以从文件读取公共类型。

trans-unit.source: - There is at least one public, non abstract class that extends the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class and contains the <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute.Yes> attribute.
trans-unit.target: -没有至少一个公共的非抽象扩展类的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>类并包含<xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute.Yes>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute.Yes> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>

trans-unit.source: - An instance of each installer can be created.
trans-unit.target: 的可以创建每个安装程序一个实例。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the assembly is valid but contains no installers, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果程序集有效，但未包含安装程序，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This behavior differs from that at install time, when it is not an error to install an empty assembly.
trans-unit.target: 此行为不同于在安装时，当它不是一个错误，安装程序的空集。

trans-unit.source: The assembly in which to search for installers.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中安装程序搜索程序集。

trans-unit.source: The specified assembly cannot be installed.
trans-unit.target: 不安装指定的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command line to use when creating a new <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref> object for the assembly's installation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用在创建新的命令行<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref>程序集的安装的对象。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.String> that represents the command line to use when creating a new <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref> object for the assembly's installation.
trans-unit.target: 类型的数组<xref:System.String>，表示要使用在创建新的命令行<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref>对象的程序集的安装。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Completes the installation transaction.
trans-unit.target: 完成安装事务。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Install%2A> methods of all the installers in this instance's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> succeed.
trans-unit.target: 仅当调用此方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Install%2A>方法的此实例中的所有安装程序<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>成功。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method then calls the Commit method of each installer in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法然后调用集合中的每个安装程序的 Commit 方法。

trans-unit.source: Store any information that you might need to do a correct uninstall operation in the saved-state <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>, which is passed to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Uninstall%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 存储，你可能需要正确进行任何信息卸载处于保存状态操作<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>，将传递给<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Uninstall%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Uninstall%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the state of the computer after all the installers in the installer collection have run.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>运行安装程序集合中的所有安装程序之后包含计算机的状态。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The savedState parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The savedState parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The saved-state <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> might have been corrupted.
trans-unit.target: -已保存状态<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>可能已损坏。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: -or- A file could not be found.
trans-unit.target: -或者-找不到文件。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred in the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing"></xref> event handler of one of the installers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 中发生错误<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing"></xref>之一的集合中的安装程序的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- An error occurred in the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed"></xref> event handler of one of the installers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -或-中发生错误<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed"></xref>之一的集合中的安装程序的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- An exception occurred during the Commit phase of the installation.
trans-unit.target: -或者-提交阶段的安装过程中出现异常。

trans-unit.source: The exception is ignored and the installation continues.
trans-unit.target: 该异常被忽略，并且安装将继续。

trans-unit.source: However, the application might not function correctly after installation completes.
trans-unit.target: 但是，安装完成后应用程序可能无法正确工作。

trans-unit.source: -or- Installer types were not found in one of the assemblies.
trans-unit.target: -或者-中某个程序集找不到安装程序类型。

trans-unit.source: -or- An instance of one of the installer types could not be created.
trans-unit.target: -或者-无法创建一个安装程序类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred during the Commit phase of the installation.
trans-unit.target: 提交阶段的安装过程中出现异常。

trans-unit.source: The exception is ignored and the installation continues.
trans-unit.target: 该异常被忽略，并且安装将继续。

trans-unit.source: However, the application might not function correctly after installation completes.
trans-unit.target: 但是，安装完成后应用程序可能无法正确工作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the help text for all the installers in the installer collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取安装程序集合中的所有安装程序的帮助文本。

trans-unit.source: An example of an installation program is the InstallUtil.exe utility.
trans-unit.target: 安装程序的示例是 InstallUtil.exe 实用工具。

trans-unit.source: The help text for all the installers in the installer collection, including the description of what each installer does and the command-line options (for the installation program) that can be passed to and understood by each installer.
trans-unit.target: 安装程序集合，包括每个安装程序的用途和可以传递给和理解的每个安装程序 （用于安装程序） 的命令行选项的说明中的所有安装程序的帮助文本。

trans-unit.source: Performs the installation.
trans-unit.target: 执行安装。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the Install method of each installer contained in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用中包含每个安装程序的安装方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>的此实例的属性。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object specified by the `savedState` parameter is updated to reflect the status of the installation after the contained installers have run.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>指定对象`savedState`参数更新以反映安装状态，包含的安装程序都运行后。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: If all the Install methods succeed, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有安装方法都成功，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Commit%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Commit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Rollback%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Rollback%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Rollback%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> used to save information needed to perform a commit, rollback, or uninstall operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>用于保存执行提交、 所需的信息回滚或卸载操作。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The savedState parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The savedState parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- A file could not be found.
trans-unit.target: -或者-找不到文件。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred in the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall"></xref> event handler of one of the installers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 中发生了异常<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall"></xref>之一的集合中的安装程序的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- An exception occurred in the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall"></xref> event handler of one of the installers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -或-中发生了异常<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall"></xref>之一的集合中的安装程序的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- Installer types were not found in one of the assemblies.
trans-unit.target: -或者-中某个程序集找不到安装程序类型。

trans-unit.source: -or- An instance of one of the installer types could not be created.
trans-unit.target: -或者-无法创建一个安装程序类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the assembly to install.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要安装的程序集的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path of the assembly to install.
trans-unit.target: 要安装的程序集的路径。

trans-unit.source: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation.
trans-unit.target: 将计算机还原到在安装之前的状态。

trans-unit.source: A rollback restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation occurred.
trans-unit.target: 回滚将计算机还原到安装发生之前的状态。

trans-unit.source: The Rollback method is called if the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Install%2A> method of this <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instance or of any installer in the installer collection fails to run correctly.
trans-unit.target: Rollback 方法调用如果<xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Install%2A>方法的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>实例，或在安装程序中的任何安装程序集合无法正确运行。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions generated by calling the Rollback method of an installer in the collection are ignored, and the rollback of the other installers continues.
trans-unit.target: 生成调用安装程序的回滚方法在集合中的任何异常将被忽略，并且其他安装程序回滚将继续。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含计算机的安装前状态。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The savedState parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The savedState parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The saved-state <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> might have been corrupted.
trans-unit.target: -已保存状态<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>可能已损坏。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: -or- A file could not be found.
trans-unit.target: -或者-找不到文件。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred in the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback"></xref> event handler of one of the installers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 中发生了异常<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback"></xref>之一的集合中的安装程序的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- An exception occurred in the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback"></xref> event handler of one of the installers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -或-中发生了异常<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback"></xref>之一的集合中的安装程序的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- An exception occurred during the Rollback phase of the installation.
trans-unit.target: -或者-回滚阶段的安装过程中出现异常。

trans-unit.source: The exception is ignored and the rollback continues.
trans-unit.target: 该异常被忽略，并且回滚将继续。

trans-unit.source: However, the computer might not be fully reverted to its initial state after the rollback completes.
trans-unit.target: 但是，计算机可能无法完全还原为其初始状态回滚完成后。

trans-unit.source: -or- Installer types were not found in one of the assemblies.
trans-unit.target: -或者-中某个程序集找不到安装程序类型。

trans-unit.source: -or- An instance of one of the installer types could not be created.
trans-unit.target: -或者-无法创建一个安装程序类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred during the Rollback phase of the installation.
trans-unit.target: 回滚阶段的安装过程中出现异常。

trans-unit.source: The exception is ignored and the rollback continues.
trans-unit.target: 该异常被忽略，并且回滚将继续。

trans-unit.source: However, the computer might not be fully reverted to its initial state after the rollback completes.
trans-unit.target: 但是，计算机可能无法完全还原为其初始状态回滚完成后。

trans-unit.source: Removes an installation.
trans-unit.target: 移除安装。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to remove a previously completed installation.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以删除以前完成的安装。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method fails for one of the installers in the collection, it is still called for the remaining installers.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>方法的集合中的安装程序失败，仍为其余的安装程序调用。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>

trans-unit.source: A failed uninstallation does not roll back the computer to its pre-uninstallation state.
trans-unit.target: 卸载失败不会不计算机回滚到其卸载前的状态。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> methods save the state of the computer after the installations, the file containing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> from the `savedState` parameter might have been deleted at some point after the installation was complete.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 尽管<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>方法保存的安装后的计算机的状态文件包含<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>从`savedState`参数可能已删除在某个时间点之后安装已完成。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the file is deleted, the `savedState` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果删除文件时，`savedState`参数是`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the post-installation state of the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含计算机的安装后状态。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The saved-state <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> might have been corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 已保存状态<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>可能已损坏。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: -or- A file could not be found.
trans-unit.target: -或者-找不到文件。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred in the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall"></xref> event handler of one of the installers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 中发生错误<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall"></xref>之一的集合中的安装程序的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- An error occurred in the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall"></xref> event handler of one of the installers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -或-中发生错误<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall"></xref>之一的集合中的安装程序的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- An exception occurred while uninstalling.
trans-unit.target: -或者-卸载时发生异常。

trans-unit.source: The exception is ignored and the uninstall continues.
trans-unit.target: 忽略异常并卸载继续进行。

trans-unit.source: However, the application might not be fully uninstalled after the uninstall completes.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在卸载完成后应用程序可能未完全卸载。

trans-unit.source: -or- Installer types were not found in one of the assemblies.
trans-unit.target: -或者-中某个程序集找不到安装程序类型。

trans-unit.source: -or- An instance of one of the installer types could not be created.
trans-unit.target: -或者-无法创建一个安装程序类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: -or- A file could not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: -或者-无法删除文件。

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred while uninstalling.
trans-unit.target: 卸载时发生异常。

trans-unit.source: The exception is ignored and the uninstall continues.
trans-unit.target: 忽略异常并卸载继续进行。

trans-unit.source: However, the application might not be fully uninstalled after the uninstall completes.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在卸载完成后应用程序可能未完全卸载。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to create a new <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref> object for the assembly's installation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否创建一个新<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref>程序集的安装的对象。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` creates a new file named "{Assembly name}.InstallLog" to log messages for this assembly.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`true`创建名为的新文件"{程序集名称}。InstallLog"此程序集记录消息。

trans-unit.source: Setting UseNewContext to `false` prevents the new file from being created.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 UseNewContext`false`阻止创建新文件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a new <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref> object should be created for the assembly's installation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果新<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext"></xref>对象创建程序集的安装; 否则为应为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
